ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Not true :) You must have missed something...this armor is now wearable by warriors of ANY race :) That s one of the things that makes it so valuable :) ...
ygData.messageBody:
Not true :)
You must have missed something...this armor is now wearable by warriors of
ANY race :)
That's one of the things that makes it so valuable :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Drew Simonis - US Internet Support [mailto:Care227@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 4:29 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor Question


From: Drew Simonis - US Internet Support <Care227@...>

Trolls can't wear this armor...


Medium sized only.



Sean.Clark@... wrote:
>
> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> Well this armor looks to good to pass up...I guess I will be breaking out
my
> Troll warrior....haven't played him in a WHILE :)
> Anybody know if Trolls are KOS by those Centaurs??
> Thanks in advance for the info :)
>
